When memory is full so the computer deletes previous variables

question.statement: Why do we include comments in code?

question.statement: What is an implicit parameter?
question.answer: A parameter enclosed in parenthesis when a method is invoked
The object on which a method is invoked

A method included in all classes

question.statement: What is an explicit parameter?

The object on which a method is invoked

A method included in all classes
